name: 5 Seconds to Mars (isyx)
description:
Earth has declared war on the colonies of Mars!...Can you escape from the clutches of Earth's space navy and make it safely back to Mars? Your crew is rooting for you! CONTROLS
  • W for forward thrust.
  • A & D for left and right rotation.
  • S to toggle HUD.
  • Q to change weapon.
  • E to activate shield.
  • Shoot with SPACE or mouse buttons.
  • ENTER to restart your run.
